trends: There has been one other sighting in Pitman
There were no other sightings in Pitman on or around August 28th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsOrbs traveling around Cassiopeia and Perseus. Later at night Jupiter. They were hovering making sharp turns zig zag. Most of the time they were faint. For a couple minutes they were bright.
Summary: Small orbs hovering, floating and zig zaging.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
